name: PCPartPicker - Dark n Simple
description: Turns the website to a new dark, to make it easy for your eyes. You can also change the accent colour to whatever you want. I would also highly recommend Material Design Colours for the customize options.

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch

additional_info: V1.1 (September 20th, 2018): ► Fixed popup module. ► Fixed left side filter/info V1.0 (September 18th, 2018): ► First release.
